text: Very fast

The horrible apple shortcuts application caused me to stumble upon this little nugget.
Apple Shortcuts default url shortener is http://is.gd/. That site is amazing b/c it lists all of the other url shorterners. https://is.gd/software.php
show
Brilliant - simple and super useful!

This is an excellent tool and  I sincerely thank the developer for making this tool available to us to use.  It is practical, eonvenient, useful, and fast.  

One feature I would like to have added would be to have the ability to attach a title or label to a generated QR image.  It will be convenient to be able to know what the QR code represents if many QR codes are accummulated to an album.  Thanks.
Didn't work. I had a similar extension that I replaced with this since this has better rating. Fail
excellent! thx to the devs
Great! But I hope there'd be an option to have TOTALLY no pop-up whenever you click to shorten a URL.
So far is the best one.
pretty good!
Good. Hope in the future it will automatically remove the user track parameters within the original link
works better than native app!
Neat, simple, does what it says with no fuss.

It doesn't matter where you are, why you created this, why you paid so much attention to detail, or what your goal is. One thing is important, and that is that you did a great job!

I wish big companies had someone like you who could eliminate extra clicks and help users reach their goals more efficiently. Even one extra click, multiplied by the number of users, can waste a lot of time and energy.

Good luck, and know that you are appreciated!
WOW ❤️
It simply works great easy and fast!!!  Thank you
10/10, without fuss, short links, no big pop-ups, just the functionality. Amazing.
nice
good
super
Great
super
Must have!
Awesome superb
Love it, made my work more easier
It's so cool!
Works perfectly.
good
I love it
nice extension
really like this app, so far so good using tiny.url. cheers
Helpful! Thank you!

Hey, it's super handy and thanks a ton for this already a great extension. But it can do QR codes already and I'm just suggesting an option to make QR code of the shortened URL (not the long one). That way the QR code would be even easier to read for any cam as it would have less details.
Useful! :)
Very good! Tried different options and chose this as the best I've found so far
Great extension. I use it numerous times monthly.
Nice, Recommended Extension

Really helped me 

it would be great to add drop down setting once u click settings after clicking extension instead of it being opened in a new tab
really good
Love the simplicity of the function and it automatically clips the clipboard 👍🏼
good
it was the 3rd url shortener that I tried and finally use. The previous two that I installed which they have the most rates didn't work.
GREAT...! its work & very helpful

love it. the token requires verify email, but worth it. can someone please tell me what url selection is the most lessest link?(url shortener>settings>selections>tinyurl.com, is.gd, v.gd, tny.im, bit.ly, or cutt.ly?)
It saves my days.

Works fast, effectively
A good one that does its job as promised.
superb!
Good one! Highly recommended
Switched to this after my other extension stopped working. Looks great so far!
Currently the best one. Fast, Reliable.

It works.  The interface is simple and clean--no big popups begging for a good review or pushing the developer's other stuff.  I tried and deleted three or four others that did the same basic task but managed to be a lot more annoying about it.  This is the one you want.
love it so much
That's an amazing link shorter. thanks so much
good extension easy to use
Shortens the URL without fuss, and unlike the others I tried, automatically copies to the clipboard.

You are my champions. thx. 
Everything - Literally - EVERYTHING ELSE - GARBAGE OUT THERE.
Simple, clean, very reasonable size of pop-up, the QR, auto-copy, no sign-up or emails requests...
keep it simple. my favorite for years.
Great, fast and minimalist with lot's of options from different providers. After trying different extensions, I'll keep this one for my daily routine.
Really useful. Please add option to have custom backends for bit.ly and other shorteners such as bit.ly/reallycoollinkadress.
Shortens your link and copies it to your clipboard. All with one click and in one second. Doesnt get any better than this.
I've tested exactly ALL extensions available until Jul 2020, and this one was the best. Fast for generating short links with qrcodes and integration with integrated analytics.
Very helpful!
Best URL Shortener with the most features, including a history of URLs shortened!
Excellent service.
Great little plugin.
Good job !
nice and customizable. would be great if we could use custom words though
good
Good.
Does what it says on the tin
Great extension.Very user friendly.

By far this is the best!
The only thing I found it missing is the option to remove the 'https://' from the shortened link. It makes the link much more clean.
Thanks the dev so much!

Works pretty well.  My only two -1 nits are:

1) Right-clicking doesn't seem to work in my browser (Version 77.0.3865.90 (64-bit)), but works from the toolbar.
2) There seems to be no ability to provide custom URLs (e.g. bit.ly, is.gd).
This is really good app. Just keep is free. I would love you.
Works as intended
Very very useful, I use it to get links to share in chats ;)

Easy to use, fast. 5/5!
Very gratefull for this easy way. Namaskar

Excellent. Love the auto-copy to clipboard feature, so convenient! I use it 10 times a day.
THANKS!
Nice and easy
It works as expected. One click and the link is copied.
Nice and easy to use!
Nice and clean. A great replacement for goo.gl. Thank you! :)
I am sold but it would be nice if with just one clic it copies it to the clipboard.
Works perfectly. I wish the temporary mini window could be smaller or vanish shortly after the link is generated. Is there any limit on link generation per month? 1000? 5000?
Thank you dev's! Great extension and excellent user interaction on your part!
very easy to use. great extension

Works like a charm.
Very Helpful!!! Thank You
Very convenient tool
Very useful plugin, automatically creates tinyurl link and copies it to clipboard.

TinyURL natively allows the user to customize the alias (eg. tinyurl.com/myLink) instead of assigning random characters for the alias (eg tinyurl.com/D8$*fY).  I'd give this 5 stars if this extension also allowed that capability.

Works well and as expected.  Usefully by right-clicking on a web page users can select "Shorten the current page link and copy" from the context menu, this makes the extension quick and painless to use.

I can't get to the link you've provided to give you the exact review, Ashok. So I'm writing it here. If one clicks on the icon and the shortened link is visible just below it, that would be perfect--as it was in goo.gl. Rest everything is fine. 5 stars from me.
So easy to use and it helps a lot
Love the simplicity of the function, especially the 'Shorten current page link and copy' function in the right-click content menu. Thank you so much.
best
Super easy to use and doesn't ask for more permissions than it takes to work.  Thanks bunches!
Amazingly useful and easy to use extension! Nice history and analytics overview (only for links shortened with the is.gd shortener).
Is.gd is a my favorite shortner because of it's small size.  This extension for Chrome is simple to use and functional.
Great extension!  I was just noticing how the the url for this page is. LOL
Great, helps me a lot
in the screen shot he use goo.gl and the reality he use is.gd -_-

Sorry to see this extension go away. I thought this was an official Google product.
So far so good! Handy and easy to use. Thank you!
It's just wow. Working magnificently:)
The greatest thing for family history research. Quickly copies exact links to ebooks, newspapers, etc. the links are short and sweet, thank you!
Brilliant. Easy. Reliable.
Love it
